title: Exact Online
description: Exact Online Wholesale Distribution and Exact Online Manufacturing are cloud-based software solutions for small to mid-sized businesses. Now with Exact Online for Android, you’ll enjoy even more value from your subscription with your key customer information and sales data at hand anywhere, anytime. Convenience & Insight•	Manage all sales processes and customer interactions on the fly•	Instantly view and report on inventory and stock availability •	Keep your remote staff in tune with up to the moment business conditions•	Interact with vendor data for instant quotes•	Quote and place orders on the roadRequirementsIn order to use Exact Online for Android, you require an Exact Online subscription. Visit www.exactonline.com for more information and sign up for a free trial.We’d love to hear your feedback on Exact Online for Android. Do you have questions, comments or problems? Send an email to info@exactonline.com
descriptionHTML:
Exact Online Wholesale Distribution and Exact Online Manufacturing are cloud-based software solutions for small to mid-sized businesses. Now with Exact Online for Android, you’ll enjoy even more value from your subscription with your key customer information and sales data at hand anywhere, anytime.

Convenience & Insight
• Manage all sales processes and customer interactions on the fly
• Instantly view and report on inventory and stock availability
• Keep your remote staff in tune with up to the moment business conditions
• Interact with vendor data for instant quotes
• Quote and place orders on the road

Requirements
In order to use Exact Online for Android, you require an Exact Online subscription. Visit www.exactonline.com for more information and sign up for a free trial.
We’d love to hear your feedback on Exact Online for Android. Do you have questions, comments or problems? Send an email to info@exactonline.com
comments: Hele app toont een wit scherm na het inloggen
Exact is niet voor dummies Zelden een app gezien die zo weinig rekening houdt met non-boekhouders.
Mooie app, blij dat het nu ook voor Android beschikbaar is!
recentChanges: * Service activity was displayed as Other at the list
* More option at total outstanding items overview does not retrieve all data (same data is displayed)
